subject: General Science
question_en: An object moving with a constant velocity is said to be in a state of?
explanation_en: Uniform motion is a state of constant velocity.
explanation_hi: समान गति एक निश्चित गति की अवस्था है।

subject: General Science
question_en: The element with atomic number 12 is?

subject: General Science
question_en: The process by which plants prepare their own food is called?
explanation_en: Photosynthesis is the process by which plants prepare their own food.
explanation_hi: फोटोसिंथेसिस पौधे अपना खुद का खाना तैयार करने की प्रक्रिया है।

subject: General Science
question_en: The process of wearing away of rocks and soil by natural forces is called?
explanation_en: Erosion is the process of wearing away of rocks and soil by natural forces.
explanation_hi: क्षरण प्राकृतिक शक्तियों द्वारा पत्थरों और मिट्टी का क्षरण है।

subject: General Science
question_en: The Indus Valley Civilization was located in which region?
explanation_en: The Indus Valley Civilization was located in the Indus Valley region.
explanation_hi: सिन्धु घाटी सभ्यता सिन्धु घाटी क्षेत्र में स्थित थी।

subject: General Science
question_en: When a force applied to an object results in a change in its motion, it is called?
explanation_en: Work is the force applied to an object resulting in a change in its motion.
explanation_hi: कार्य एक वस्तु पर लगाया गया बल जिससे उसकी गति में परिवर्तन होता है।

subject: General Science
question_en: The pH scale is used to measure the?
explanation_en: The pH scale is used to measure the acidity of a solution.
explanation_hi: पीएच पैमाना एक समाधान के तीखेपन को मापता है।

subject: General Science
question_en: The study of heredity and variation is called?
explanation_en: Genetics is the study of heredity and variation.
explanation_hi: वंशावली विज्ञान वंशावली और परिवर्तन का अध्ययन है।

subject: General Science
question_en: The highest mountain peak in the Himalayas is?
explanation_en: Mount Everest is the highest mountain peak in the Himalayas.
explanation_hi: माउंट एवरेस्ट हिमालय में सबसे ऊंची चोटी है।

subject: General Science
question_en: The phenomenon of reflection of light is an example of?
explanation_en: Reflection of light is an example of the phenomenon of reflection.
explanation_hi: प्रकाश का प्रतिबिंब प्रतिबिंब का प्रकरण है।
